titleStmt.title: A poem being an essay upon the present vvar with the Dutch, since the first battel and victory obtained by His Highness Royal, June 3, 1665, continued to and upon the late happy victory obtained by His Majesties forces at sea, under the conduct of His Highness Prince Rupert, and His Grace the Duke of Albemarle, July 25, 1666 / by John Eames.
titleStmt.author: Eames, John, 17th cent.
